page.title: 03BARCOMBE NEWS (continued)
page.content: {Guide Dogs for the Blind. Delighted to report Dog No.4 has just been paid for. {Were you born in the year 1910? The Guiding movement was also "born"in that year.The 1st Barcombe Brownies have decided to have a celebration of their own to mark the 75th birthday. Any ladies or gentlemen who are also celebrating their 75th year are invited to join them on Fri 19th July at 5p.m. for tea and entertainment. {Barcombe Fun Run-Great Success About 250 competitors started at the rear of the Fire Station on May Day. 25 charities were supported to a total sponsorship of Â£1,452. {Action Research for the Crippled Child Events are an Antiques Fair on Sat 1st June and a Clothes Party on Thur 6th June. {}
